forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with periods of light rain and snow later in the day. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the evening. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the evening. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 39F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 2C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 31F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Some snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.
